mapper.select: SELECT ID, CREATE_TIME, NAME, URL, DESCRIPTION, CATEGORY_ID FROM ums_resource

SELECT UR.ID ID, UR.CREATE_TIME CREATETIME, UR.NAME NAME, UR.URL URL, UR.DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION, UR.CATEGORY_ID CATEGORYID FROM ums_admin_role_relation AR LEFT JOIN ums_role R ON AR.ROLE_ID = R.ID LEFT JOIN ums_role_resource_relation RRR ON R.ID = RRR.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN ums_resource UR ON UR.ID = RRR.RESOURCE_ID WHERE AR.ADMIN_ID = #{accountId} AND UR.ID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY UR.ID
